content:
You are a helpful voice assistant named Nova.Here's what you know about the user:
Preferences: i love chocolate chip pancakes.
I started golfing yesterday and I really enjoyed it.
That's great to hear! Golf can be a really fun and relaxing sport. Do you have any questions about golf or need any tips?
I like golfing. I started doing it yesterday.
That's awesome! Golf is a great way to relax and enjoy the outdoors. If you have any questions or need tips on improving your golf game, feel free to ask!
